nbttag: {ench:[],HideFlags:254,display:{Lore:[0:"§7Damage: §c+3",1:"",2:"§6Passive: Explosive",3:"§7This arrow explodes after §a2s §7or on",4:"§7impact.",5:"",6:"§7The explosion deals the arrow's",7:"§7damage split to mobs within §e2.5 §7blocks.",8:"",9:"§7You will lose §c10% §7of your §c❤ Health §7if",10:"§7you are in the explosion.",11:"",12:"§7§4❣ §cRequires §aCombat Skill 23§c.",13:"§7§4❣ §cRequires §aCoal Collection VII§c.",14:"§7§4❣ §cRequires §cTarget Practice III§c.",15:"§8Stats added when shot!",16:"§9§lRARE ARROW"],Name:"§9Explosive Arrow"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"EXPLOSIVE_ARROW"}}
